name: Pocket Pirate 3D
description:
Welcome to the high seas! For the love of adventures and the curiosity about the unknown, friends from across the seas have gathered here. They will face an unknown stretch of the ocean with powerful yet mysterious creatures, massive treasures hidden deep in the sea, along with a wild bunch of pirates. Will they stand the test? What challenges will they encounter? And what will they find?

Join and begin a brand-new adventure!

[Features]
====Brand new stories of fabulous adventure!
A whole new universe of spectacular battlefields and scenario unfold before your eyes. Join this brand-new adventure!

====Infinite combos, awesome battles!
Thrilling real-time PvP arena, dazzling skills and visual effects, and the unique infinite combos make your gaming experience explode with feverish excitement!

====Rich gameplays, massive free goodies
Explore the world, with Elite Arena, sea monster challenge, canyon hunt and many great game plays. Login and you get the strongest heroes and free recruits waiting for you!
